name: Tempus Bob
description:
Take to the skies in this classic Time Pilot inspired game. Take on different enemies and utilize different power ups to survive. Do you have what it takes to beat this arcade style experience?

Features:
- 4 enemy types
- 3 power ups
- 1 player

Developed for TAMK Games Academy autumn 2022 season project.

Team members:
Niko Holopainen
Valtteri Kamppinen
Joonas Järvinen
Joey Audi
Vuokko Lehtola
Aino Virtala
